snippet: MACNAMARA--Antoinette (Toni) Beckers, of Wayland, MA, formerly of Weston, MA, died peacefully on April 2, 2016, she was 86. Beloved wife of the late Robert W. Macnamara, Esq. Loving mother of Lili Macnamara of Sudbury, MA; Toni Yacobian of Boston, MA; Robert W. Macnamara, Jr of Sudbury, MA; W. Kurt Macnamara of Boston, MA; Susan Martinez of Alexandria, VA. Funeral from the George F. Doherty & Sons Funeral Home, 477 Washington St. (Rt.16) Wellesley, MA on Friday, April 8 at 9:30am followed by a Funeral Mass in St. Julia Church, Weston at 10:30am. Visiting hours Thursday from 5-8pm in the funeral home. Interment private in Linwood Cemetery, Weston, MA. In lieu of flowers, expressions of sympathy may be made to Children's Hospital League, 401 Park Dr. Suite 602, Boston, MA 02115. For directions and guestbook, gfdoherty.com. 1/3
